definitions.definition: The state or quality of being active ; activeness .
examples: Pit row was abuzz with activity .

definitions.definition: Something done as an action or a movement .
examples: The activity for the morning was a walk to the store.

definitions.definition: Something done for pleasure or entertainment , especially one involving movement or an excursion.
examples: An increasing number of sports activities are on offer at the university.
Quilting can be an enjoyable activity .

definitions.definition: The lexical aspect ( aktionsart ) of verbs or predicates that change over time and have no natural end point.
The number of radioactive decays per unit time. Unit for it: becquerel or curie
The property of substances to react with other substances

main_definition: ( uncountable ) The state or quality of being active ; activeness .
secondary_definitions: ( countable ) Something done as an action or a movement .
( countable ) Something done for pleasure or entertainment , especially one involving movement or an excursion.
( grammar , semantics ) The lexical aspect ( aktionsart ) of verbs or predicates that change over time and have no natural end point.
( physics ) The number of radioactive decays per unit time. Unit for it: becquerel or curie
The property of substances to react with other substances
